name: Chef's Kiss
description:
*Chef's Kiss*

Chef's Kiss is a 2-4 player game where you can live out your dream of making an Italian dish at the expense of others! Choose 1 of 8 chefs to embody as you embark on a culinary journey. Gather ingredients to make more ingredients and then put them all in an oven or on a stove and voila! That's called cooking!

Chef's Kiss contains:
  • 1 Rulebook
  • 64 Base Ingredients
  • 20 Combo Ingredients
  • 16 Event Cards
  • 6 Equipment Cards
  • 8 Player Cards
  • and 4 Recipe Cards

That 118 total cards of pure, Italian fun!

So what are you waiting for? Gather a small number of friends and have the time of your life. My roommates said it was very fun!

Game Designers:
  • Jake Gollub
  • Dane Hildreth
  • Nevin Portillo
  • Dustin Chang
Card Artists:
  • Jake Gollub - Base Ingredients, Combo Ingredients, Equipment
  • Dane Hildreth - Player Cards, Recipe Cards, Card Backs/Logo
